name: Suspicious Rundll32 Without Any CommandLine Params
description: Detects suspicious start of rundll32.exe without any parameters as found in CobaltStrike beacon activity
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.command_line:*\\rundll32.exe AND (NOT (process.parent.executable:*\\svchost.exe))) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable:(*\\AppData\\Local\\* OR *\\Microsoft\\Edge\\*))))`
